ParallelChunk.en: I have just received information that the Under-Secretary-General of the United Nations, Mr Muhammad Shaaban, is in the official gallery.
ParallelChunk.fr: J'apprends que le sous-secrétaire général des Nations unies, M. Muhammad Shaaban, vient de prendre place dans la tribune officielle.

ParallelChunk.en: I should like to welcome the representative of the United Nations.
